sentences.english: To ensure peaceful use of outer space is in the common interest of humankind.
sentences.chinese: 确保外空和平利用符合全人类的共同利益。

sentences.english: Fifth, handle properly the relationship between nuclear security and peaceful use of nuclear energy.
sentences.chinese: 第五，切实处理好核安全与和平利用核能的关系。

sentences.english: The peaceful use of outer space is in the interest of all peoples of the world.
sentences.chinese: 和平利用外空符合世界各国人民的根本利益。

sentences.english: It is the responsibility of all space-faring nations to commit to the peaceful uses of outer space.
sentences.chinese: 所有发展航天事业的国家都应致力于和平利用外空。

sentences.english: The peaceful –use of space is the long-cherished dream of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 和平利用太空是人类长期以来的梦想。
